brief_summary.textblock:
This study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of MabThera/Rituxan plus methotrexate in
      patients with active rheumatoid arthritis who have had an inadequate response to at least 1
      DMARD treatment. All patients will receive MabThera (1000mg iv infusion) on days 1 and 15,
      and methotrexate (10-25mg po) weekly. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12
      months.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of MabThera/Rituxan (Rituximab) in Combination With Methotrexate in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis and Inadequate Response to DMARD Therapy

intervention.description: iv administration on Day 1 and 15 prior to MabThera/Rituxan infusion

clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label Study to Evaluate the Effect of MabThera in Combination With Methotrexate on Disease Activity in Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis After DMARD Treatment Failure

oversight_info.authority: Serbia: Medicines and Medical Devices Agency of Serbia

primary_outcome.measure: Change in disease activity DAS 28 score

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
